    function CreateTypedArrayTypes() {
        var typedArrays = [];
        typedArrays[0] = Int8Array;
                         ~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Int8Array'.
        typedArrays[1] = Uint8Array;
                         ~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Uint8Array'.
        typedArrays[2] = Int16Array;
                         ~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Int16Array'.
        typedArrays[3] = Uint16Array;
                         ~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Uint16Array'.
        typedArrays[4] = Int32Array;
                         ~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Int32Array'.
        typedArrays[5] = Uint32Array;
                         ~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Uint32Array'.
        typedArrays[6] = Float32Array;
                         ~~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Float32Array'.
        typedArrays[7] = Float64Array;
                         ~~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Float64Array'.
        typedArrays[8] = Uint8ClampedArray;
                         ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Uint8ClampedArray'.
    
        return typedArrays;
    }
